CustomField.formula: TEXT(DAY(TODAY())) & " " & CASE(MONTH(TODAY()), 1, "Januari", 2, "Februari", 3, "Maret", 4, "April", 5, "Mei", 6, "Juni", 7, "Juli", 8, "Agustus", 9, "September", 10, "Oktober", 11, "November", 12, "Desember", "" ) & " " & TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())) & " Pukul " & LPAD(TEXT(HOUR(TIMENOW())+7), 2, "0") & ":" & LPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(TIMENOW())), 2, "0") & " WIB"
CustomField.label: Current Datetime
